The Jamaican High Commission


  • Home
  • Consulate Affairs

About the Jamaican High Commision in Abuja, Nigeria.

The Jamaican High Comission in Abuja the capital of the Federal Republic of Nigeria provides consular services to assist Jamaicans and non-Jamaican citizens and help to promote Jamaica in the cities where they have jurisdiction. These countries include the Federal Republic of Nigeria, Republics of Cameroon, Ghana, Senegal and Sierre Leone. For visit to the Consular Office, Jamaicans can schedule an appointment by contacting the chancery at telephone numbers 0813 606 3356 or 0816 737 4252 . Citizens of Jamaica can also contact the Chancery by email via Send Email or the contact page of this website. The Jamaican High Commission is here to serve its Country and its People.

General Services offered by the Consulate

  • Provide consular services to Jamaican citizens including passport, citizenship and notarial services
  • Provide general information to the Jamaican community specific to their needs and to the public at large
  • Provide support to Jamaicans visiting the country or region where they are located
  • Provide emergency assistance to distressed Jamaican citizens
  • Issue visas and provide general advice to foreigners who wish to visit Jamaica

The Jamaican High Commissioner

Consulate Highlights
